application.model

Interface iModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Model

    public interface iModel
    The model for the visualization application, handles the operations and the datastructures and applies the operations as designated.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      iStep getCurrentStep()
      The current state of the datastructures given the current index contained in an iStep
      int getIndex()
      Return the current index of this model.
      java.util.List<Operation> getOperations()
      A list containing all the operations held by the model.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DataStructure> getStructures()
      Returns a hashmap with the identifiers and the datastructures.
      void goToEnd()
      Apply all the operations on the datastructures.
      void goToStep(int toStepNo)
      Jump to designated index
      void reset()
      Return the model to the state before any operations were applied
      void set(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DataStructure> structs, java.util.List<Operation> ops)
      Set data for the model
      void setOperations(java.util.List<Operation> operations)
      Set the operations to be applied to the structs
      boolean stepBackward()
      Move the model one step backward.
      boolean stepForward()
      Move the model one step forward

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        void reset()
        Return the model to the state before any operations were applied

      • stepForward

        boolean stepForward()
        Move the model one step forward
        Returns:
        if the step forward was executed succesfully

      • stepBackward

        boolean stepBackward()
        Move the model one step backward. Currently resets model and replays all operations up until current index -1
        Returns:
        if backwards step was succesfull

      • set

        void set(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DataStructure> structs,
         java.util.List<Operation> ops)
        Set data for the model
        Parameters:
        structs - to be modeled
        ops - to be applied to the structs

      • setOperations

        void setOperations(java.util.List<Operation> operations)
        Set the operations to be applied to the structs
        Parameters:
        operations - to be applied

      • getStructures

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DataStructure> getStructures()
        Returns a hashmap with the identifiers and the datastructures.
        Returns:
        The map of data structures held by this model.

      • getOperations

        java.util.List<Operation> getOperations()
        A list containing all the operations held by the model.
        Returns:
        the list of operations held by this model.

      • getCurrentStep

        iStep getCurrentStep()
        The current state of the datastructures given the current index contained in an iStep
        Returns:
        the current step of this model.

        Parameters:

      • goToEnd

        void goToEnd()
